name: cshwrn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wss(crn(co(c0, ccsh, c2)), c1))

stmt.origin: frnd(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)))
stmt.pretty: frnd((c0[cyclShift]c2), c1, (0[..^](# ` c0)), (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wss(crn(co(c0, ccsh, c2)), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wf(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→ ran((c0[cyclShift]c2))⊆ c1)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[cyclShift]c2):(0[..^](# ` c0))→ c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wss(crn(co(c0, ccsh, c2)), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wf(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→ ran((c0[cyclShift]c2))⊆ c1)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[cyclShift]c2):(0[..^](# ` c0))→ c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wf(co(c0, ccsh, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wss(crn(co(c0, ccsh, c2)), c1))

comment: The range of a cyclically shifted word is a subset of the set of symbols for the word. (Contributed by AV, 12-Nov-2018.)
